description: Owen Corso wrote and recorded all these tracks. Check them out on his portfolio website: ored.net

user.website_title: O Red is Pure Production Power

title: O Red Folio

tracks.title: A Life's Path
tracks.description: Owen Corso - vocals/drums Garin Glassy - guitars/bass Lyrics by Owen Corso, music by Garin Glassy Gotta get the jist of it Gotta feel like something is gonna go well What about this life makes it so hard And what is what? And who is who? Which way will my life go? A child stands eyes open for what seems like the first time Rediscover experience by watching his understanding grow Where ever you may go, whoever you may see Remember life is a journey through many toils and snares yeah We learn to love and grow Now our lives paths have crossed A hilltop blazen in the distant past An onrush of emotion comes with the memory of The memory of a moment, A window through time Remember how it used to be and how it will be The door of the future is forever opening The struggle continues in a world of turmoil, it’s hard to find a way Appreciate the excitement and the freedom life gives you We gotta keep on doing the very best we can Cause all these things going on will work themselves out We learn to love and grow Now our lives paths have crossed The child stands with his eyes wide open, the river flows on. The blood in our veins moves ever quickly, Red as the sun. The river flows like the blood in our veins Together we move forward immortalized in time The tendrils of ours lives are completely tied We learn to love and grow Now our lives paths have crossed Step by step, right and wrong, up and down, weak or strong Everyday, anyway, come what may, we’ll do it our way

user.description: This was a rock collective formed at Villanova University and active from 1999-2003

tracks.title: Not Forgotten
tracks.description: Owen Corso - vocals/drums/piano/sax/trumpet Garin Glassy - guitars/bass Andrew Clark - guitars/bass Words and music by Owen Corso So hard to find So hard to find a beginning A struggle that sways even the very best Even those few who were brave enough in life To leave behind themselves So easy to fall, so easy to fall apart A rising tide drowns out the whole world Even the strongest must fall sometime To the wave of life A flash of light and a smile of welcome Turn toward the memory Of a love that still burns on and on, think again, reawaken the love that still burns on – it will burn on in my heart –forever So hard to make, so hard to make a way. A path clouded by the misery of mourning. Even if one more chance was given to show this love It wouldn’t be enough. So easy to just, so easy to just give up A bell rings from the past and it hurts the ears to hear the pain. Sometimes emotions rain down A flash of light and a smile of welcome Turn toward the memory Of a love that still burns on and on, think again, reawaken the love that still burns on – it will burn on in my heart –forever

tracks.title: Hold On
tracks.description:
HOLD ON
~Words and music by Owen Corso

you have to know in the back of your head 
that life on this earth is gonna be temporary, 
	its not that long

but now it must be difficult for you 
as circumstances bring it up and make you deal with it, 
	deal with it

no i don’t wanna know, i can’t lose what i never had

at the end no i wasn’t there 
they said he just took one more breathe and then he was gone, 
he was gone.

we were so young, that is so far away
i can still recall
we were so lonely hearted, we were broken down
that was long ago
hold on, hang on, keep on holding on

In the midst of a forgotten dream, 
you’ve been encompassed by your own self-assurance and fear
you run and you hide

what are you afraid of anyway? don’t you know that there’s peace inside?
and the power of your presence can and will conquer it all

and when you’re up there close to the end, just remember that i love you so
he said i know

we were so young, that is so far away
i can still recall
we were so lonely hearted, we were broken down
that was long ago
hold on, hang on, keep on holding on

I’m so burned inside
all i know is
I don’t wanna be left alone, 
all alone and cold
some things you cannot change 
but other things you can
let serenity and wisdom be your guide 
as we hold on

we were so young, that is so far away
i can still recall
we were so lonely hearted, we were broken down
that was long ago
hold on, hang on, keep on holding on

we were so young, that is so far away
i can still recall
we were so lonely hearted, we were broken down
that was long ago
hold on, hang on, keep on holding on

Red Machine is an original rock & roll band based in New York City.

Owen Corso - Guitars/vocals
Nick Agderian - Drums
Michael Vier - Guitar
Matt Desteno - Bass
user.website_title: Red Machine is an O Red Production

tracks.title: Jon's Song
tracks.description: Owen Corso - Vocals/Guitar Garin Glassy - Lead Guitar Zack Taylor - Bass Christine Kevan Licata - Vocals Paul Costabile - Drums Words and music by Owen Corso Breaking him down, breaking him down Its been this way for so long will it ever stop so we can grow up and enjoy ourselves for a change. cease this quarreling, mindless squabbling. We need to learn to love despite the differences that surround us. He’s got a girl; a cutie, little, pumpkin head He met her down at the beach now in a sunset And he spends all of his days now standing by her side On the rooftop, so many nights spent together Its got to look good now Its got to look beautiful He’s going down yeah, she’s finally broken him To put the ring on and say yeah to rest of his life To the life that keeps moving on Its time to get it to look good Its got to look good now Its got to look beautiful Its got to look good now Its got to look beautiful

tracks.title: Goodbye Again
tracks.description: Owen Corso - Vocals/Guitar Garin Glassy - Lead Guitar Zack Taylor - Bass Christine Kevan Licata - Vocals Paul Costabile - Drums Words and music by Owen Corso I was only dreaming for a night Till the sunlight burned me to my soul I was a lost and lonely boy so far away and in so much pain times had changed the tears fill my eyes and the tears fill your eyes I can’t say goodbye again I can’t say goodbye again but I know we will be together soon ‘n we’ll fall asleep knowing you are there All this time is ever wasted, when your not here. I’m waiting for the day when you can hold me in your arms so don’t ever say we won’t end up Don’t ever say we won’t end up Look into the eyes of the devil himself he winked at me ;) Cheated to the point of loneliness Times had changed tears fill my eyes tears fill your eyes can’t say goodbye again can’t say goodbye again but I know we will be together soon ‘n we’ll fall asleep knowing you are there so don’t ever say we won’t end up Don’t ever say we won’t end up

tracks.title: Andy's Song
tracks.description: Owen Corso - vocals/drums/piano/sax/trumpet Garin Glassy - guitars/bass Andrew Clark - guitars/bass Words by Owen Corso, music by Andrew Clark Wastin’ away again a desert gloom Secretly sliding and sinking somewhere slowly down Just about to get to where I need to go Desperately seeking some answers: why? As we struggle to learn about the world around us Intangible ever-open ended Bright and dark it may very well be Cause we see those who linger in hunger We see those who suffer without And I’m wondering who I am in this circle of life We’re moving towards the light -towards the light (echo) we’re gonna make it right -make it right (echo) the way towards salvation burns bring Wastin’ away again with a desert bloom thinking about all the things that I haven’t done I have my dreams, I have my family but aspirations crumble in the shiftless yeah Clouded is the future but determine dreamers’ paths are still rising A vision of beauty and truth burns right through the pain And I just wanna reach out and help all of those suffering And when the peace comes to us we will see hope come true This life that passes day by day will be alright in the end

tracks.title: Jersey Dreams
tracks.description: Owen Corso - Vocals/Guitar Garin Glassy - Lead Guitar Zack Taylor - Bass Christine Kevan Licata - Vocals Paul Costabile - Drums Words and music by Owen Corso Orange and red sets down over the bay and this time it's a sailor's delight Little girl walks down the road where he is waiting He's the one she's been in love with for so long she thinks that someday she will wear his ring. Where does she think she's going? Who does she think she is? Is she gonna roll on? its just another set of jersey dreams its just another way to live this life its just another set of jersey dreams [come walk with me] its just another chance Come walk with me and i'll show you what its like Little boy wakes up in the morning and goes to work so hard he thinks that if he tries hard enough to build up these dreams then maybe someday it'll lift him up and lead him all the way from here its just another set of jersey dreams its just another way to live this life its just another set of jersey dreams [come walk with me] its just another chance but who does he think he is? where does he think he's going? is he really gonna live that life ? or is this the way its gonna be its just another set of jersey dreams its just another way to live this life its just another set of jersey dreams [come walk with me] its just another chance Feel the tide rise the sand between the toes smell the salty air it another long summertime for you and me Coming up the parkway after a long weekend, the weather's been good so far but will it last?

tracks.title: I Won't Let You Down
tracks.description: Owen Corso - Vocals/acoustic guitar Dan Colucci - Vocals/electric guitar Elizabeth Brown - Vocals/bass Chris Rogers - Drums Words and music by Owen Corso many men have travelled along this road alone sprung from that dark ether, i came before the dawn i watched you walk away how can this be? i burned the candle stay here with me as we lay beside the fire i won't let you down stay here with me as we lay beside the fire i won't let you down me and my brothers and sisters, all we do is try you don't know unless you've been there, the kind of pain this is i tried to make it up to you but that didn't work at all now i'm left with nothing except this empty space i watched you walk away how could you do this to me? the candle keeps burning on stay here with me as we lay beside the fire i won't let you down stay here with me as we lay beside the fire i won't let you down

tracks.title: Outstretched
tracks.description: Owen Corso - vocals/drums/piano/sax/trumpet Garin Glassy - guitars/bass Andrew Clark - guitars/bass Words and music by Owen Corso Broken in two, so long and far away Terms of endearment turn into tears Lost in a desert of solitude Gone are the days of certainty Instead of taking a turn for the worse Rather than giving up and giving in The chair of an old friend awaits He sits with arms outstretched Before I blame it all on myself again And make waste of another moment I reach out with my heart outstretched The yearning driven from deep within Street lights line the foggy road Can’t see very far into the white Peace seems to seep in somehow Nothing important hides in the shadows Lost in a daydream, this room fades away More than ready for the next step Thoughts of a memory drain the mind Forcing the reality of it all to fall into place Before I blame it all on myself again And made waste of another moment I reach out with my life outstretched This yearning that's driven from deep within I reach out with my soul outstretched A yearning that's driven from deep within

tracks.title: Need
tracks.description: Owen Corso - Vocals/Guitar Garin Glassy - Lead Guitar Zack Taylor - Bass Christine Kevan Licata - Vocals Paul Costabile - Drums Words and music by Owen Corso Believe yeah in the way that I’m feeling Its been about 3 or 4 months Since I’ve been seeing you everyday Growing closer to place where I need to be and then you see, right into my eyes You see I’m for real, Don’t even let it fall don't let it go, don’t ever let change cause you just might understand I need You to let me know I need You to let me know how you want it tonight. Believe in the way that you’re feeling It just about gets close and then I said I need you to tell me exactly what you got to say cause changes that come over and through this change in time is a whoo state of flux yeah cause you got so much to learn don't even let it fall now (don't let it go) don't ever let it change cause you might just go on away, don't stop cause i need to know I need You to let me know I need You to let me know how you want it tonight.

tracks.title: Make It Good (7 6 2013)
tracks.description:
Great 4th of July Weekend 2013 at Cape Cod. Had a few low key performances throughout the weekend featuring Colin Geoffroy on cello.

MAKE IT GOOD 

here we are 
just another set of circumstances
another chance to do it right
will we it be right?
through all of my life i'm trying to do things again
till it get it without making mistakes, 
without making mistakes.

cause i'm gonna make it good
that's really all i been trying to do 

i know you've been afraid to let 
to let me come into you heart
cause you've seen how i have been 
well that's all in the past 
cause i'm not gonna do it all over again
i'm not gonna do it again

i'm gonna make it good
that's really all i've been trying to do

so we go
down the road
never knowing which way
the winds of the change will blow
but we always end up better x2

you and i have been the best of friends
so many adventures, so many times
we've had throughout the world
you can be sure that i am worth it
i will never ever leave
i will never leave

cause i'm gonna make it good.
that's really all i been trying to do.

cause we go
down the road
never knowing which way
the winds of the change will blow
always end up better x2

something happened in here
and its really really bad
did you read the words that i said?

please forgive these things i've done
cause tomorrow's another chance to get it right
please forgive these things i've done
cause tomorrow's another 
chance
	to get it 
		right

so climb on in..

cause i'm gonna make it good.
